    • Uses of MemoryAllocator in org.neo4j.io.mem

      Classes in org.neo4j.io.mem that implement MemoryAllocator 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GrabAllocator
      This memory allocator is allocating memory in large segments, called "grabs", and the memory returned by the memory manager is page aligned, and plays well with transparent huge pages and other operating system optimisations.
      Methods in org.neo4j.io.mem that return MemoryAllocator 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
